Package org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.process.impl

Class ActivityDefinitionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.process.impl.FlowElementContainerBuilder
      • org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.process.impl.ActivityDefinitionBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DescriptionBuilder, FlowElementBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutomaticTaskDefinitionBuilder, CallActivityBuilder, ManualTaskDefinitionBuilder, ReceiveTaskDefinitionBuilder, SendTaskDefinitionBuilder, UserTaskDefinitionBuilder
    public class ActivityDefinitionBuilder
extends FlowElementContainerBuilder
implements DescriptionBuilder
    Author:
    Matthieu Chaffotte

      • addConnector

        public ConnectorDefinitionBuilder addConnector​(String name,
                                               String connectorId,
                                               String version,
                                               ConnectorEvent activationEvent)
        Description copied from interface: FlowElementBuilder
        Add a connector on this element

        Must also add connector dependencies and connector implementation descriptor

        Specified by:
        addConnector in interface FlowElementBuilder
        Overrides:
        addConnector in class FlowElementContainerBuilder
        Parameters:
        name - The name the connector instance will use
        connectorId - The id of the Connector definition (connector implementation added in BusinessArchive must match this id in definitionId
        version - The version of the Connector definition
        activationEvent - ConnectorEvent on which the connector will be triggered
        Returns:
        See Also:
        BusinessArchiveBuilder.addClasspathResource(org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.bar.BarResource), BusinessArchiveBuilder.addConnectorImplementation(org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.bar.BarResource)

      • addDisplayDescriptionAfterCompletion

        public ActivityDefinitionBuilder addDisplayDescriptionAfterCompletion​(Expression displayDescriptionAfterCompletion)
        Sets the display description after completion on this activity. This will be used to updated the display description when the activity completes its execution
        Parameters:
        displayDescriptionAfterCompletion - expression representing the new display description after the activity completion.
        Returns:

      • addOperation

        public ActivityDefinitionBuilder addOperation​(LeftOperand leftOperand,
                                              OperatorType type,
                                              String operator,
                                              Expression rightOperand)
        Adds an operation on this activity. Operations are executed between connectors ON_ENTER and connectors ON_FINISH. In the case of human tasks, operations are executed after calling the method ProcessRuntimeAPI.executeFlowNode(long)
        Parameters:
        leftOperand - operation left operand
        type - operator type
        operator - operator
        rightOperand - expression representing the right operand
        Returns:

      • addOperation

        public ActivityDefinitionBuilder addOperation​(LeftOperand leftOperand,
                                              OperatorType type,
                                              String operator,
                                              String operatorInputType,
                                              Expression rightOperand)
        Adds an operation on this activity. Operations are executed between connectors ON_ENTER and connectors ON_FINISH. In the case of human tasks, operations are executed after calling the method ProcessRuntimeAPI.executeFlowNode(long)
        Parameters:
        leftOperand - operation left operand
        type - operator type
        operator - operator
        operatorInputType - the input operator type. For instance, the parameter type in the case of a Java setter
        rightOperand - expression representing the right operand
        Returns:

      • addOperation

        public ActivityDefinitionBuilder addOperation​(Operation operation)
        Adds the given operation on this activity
        Parameters:
        operation - operation to be added
        Returns:

      • addLoop

        public ActivityDefinitionBuilder addLoop​(boolean testBefore,
                                         Expression condition)
        Defines this activity as a loop. The loop will finish when the condition is evaluated to false
        Parameters:
        testBefore - true if the condition must be check before execute the first iteration; false if the condition must be checked only after the first iteration
        condition - condition determining whether the activity must loop again
        Returns:

      • addLoop

        public ActivityDefinitionBuilder addLoop​(boolean testBefore,
                                         Expression condition,
                                         Expression loopMax)
        Defines this activity as a loop. The loop will finish when the condition is evaluated to false or when the max iterations number is reached
        Parameters:
        testBefore - true if the condition must be check before execute the first iteration; false if the condition must be checked only after the first iteration
        condition - condition determining whether the activity must loop again. The loop will finish when the condition is evaluated to false
        loopMax - expression representing the max iterations number. The expression must return an Integer
        Returns:

      • addBoundaryEvent

        public BoundaryEventDefinitionBuilder addBoundaryEvent​(String name,
                                                       boolean interrupting)
        Adds a boundary event
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the boundary event
        interrupting - defines whether the boundary event is interrupting or not
        Returns:
        Since:
        6.0

      • addBoundaryEvent

        public BoundaryEventDefinitionBuilder addBoundaryEvent​(String name)
        Adds an interrupting boundary event
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the boundary event
        Returns:
        Since:
        6.0

      • addMultiInstance

        public MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristicsBuilder addMultiInstance​(boolean isSequential,
                                                                Expression loopCardinality)
        Defines this activity as a multi-instance by suppling the cardinality
        Parameters:
        isSequential - defines whether instances creation is sequential or not. If true, instances will be created iteration by iteration; otherwise all instances will be created during the activity initialization.
        loopCardinality - expression representing how many instances must be created. The expression return type must be Integer
        Returns:

      • addMultiInstance

        public MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristicsBuilder addMultiInstance​(boolean isSequential,
                                                                String loopDataInput)
        Defines this activity as a multi-instance by suppling a collection of elements. One instance will be created for each element in the collection.
        Parameters:
        isSequential - defines whether instances creation is sequential or not. If true, instances will be created iteration by iteration; otherwise all instances will be created during the activity initialization.
        loopDataInput - name of process data representing the collection of elements used to create the instances
        Returns:
        See Also:
        MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristicsBuilder.addLoopDataOutputRef(String), MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristicsBuilder.addDataInputItemRef(String), MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristicsBuilder.addDataOutputItemRef(String)

      • addBusinessData

        public ActivityDefinitionBuilder addBusinessData​(String name,
                                                 String className)
        Adds a Business Data on the activity. The activity must contain a MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics using dataInput or dataOutput.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the business data
        className - complete name of class defining the Business Data Type
        Returns:
